title: 62 15 Window project - Single shade of Grey

posts.content:
Is it that little bit on the C post that still needs welding?

Enjoy your hols.

Steve

rusty1962 wrote:Is it that little bit on the C post that still needs welding?

Enjoy your hols.

Steve


Yep, well spotted!!! I had already mixed the paint and masked up when I noticed so left it for another day, annoying though!!

Cheers mate, will be keeping an eye on your progress whilst Im away though so no slacking!!
Looks like you're making great progress, makes me realise how little I have actually done on mine. Will be watching the updates with interest

pokey wrote:Anymore done??


Nah sorry pal, Im away at the moment, although changes are afoot!! Been chatting with the wife and thinking a lot!! Big change of plan I think as to the direction we are going, all will be revealed! Tylers fault!!
Intriguing
Would it be something to do with something for sale I saw you enquire about...I won reveal what.....I'm not that type of person 4 doing things like that......

jonthebuilder wrote:Would it be something to do with something for sale I saw you enquire about...I won reveal what.....I'm not that type of person 4 doing things like that......


Haha, nice and cryptic there, like your style!!

Nah sorry pal, Im away at the moment, although changes are afoot!! Been chatting with the wife and thinking a lot!! Big change of plan I think as to the direction we are going, all will be revealed! Tylers fault!!


Hey Bud,

How's the project coming? Interested to see what the Big changes are!

jonthebuilder wrote:Would it be something to do with something for sale I saw you enquire about...I won reveal what.....I'm not that type 4 of person doing things like that......


Me neither.

Hi guys, well we are all back from our hols, and changes are indeed afoot! Unfortunately Tyler's engine wasn't the right spec for a bus, more of a beetle motor soI bailed on that one, but looks like the Tdi plan is shelved and a nice Type IV turbo motor is on the cards!!

Literally havent touched the van for weeks now, we are putting a log burner in our house ready for Winter so my time has been spent knee deep in brick rubble and soot. Hoping to be back on he van next week though all been well.

Anyone know what kind of power a 6 rib Type 2 bus can handle without beefing the internals up? The Type IV will be putting out a decent amount of torque so need to know wether that needs attention first!

Cheers guys,

Hopefully back to normal next week!

TDI shelved! Shame I was looking forward to seeing that!

I put 300bhp from an Impreza motor through an 091 6 rib without any issues, I didn't ever give it a really hard time from standing start though.
